video.title: Development environment for web developers using VS Code and iTerm
video.description:
Learn about the development environment used by a professional web developer. He points out the advantages of the setup for his work and gives an introduction to the products he uses. Then he shows a demonstration of his workflow.

🔗Favorite Visual Studio Code Extensions Article: https://medium.freecodecamp.org/favorite-vs-code-extensions-2017-786ea235812f

Talk by Daniel Deutsch at the freeCodeCamp Vienna meetup.

🐦Daniel on Twitter: https://twitter.com/_createdd

Recorded by Pusher.com. Check them out if you want awesome real-time tools, and subscribe to the their YouTube channel for more talks!

Pusher's channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoyqucxoFXDFnh3khD0rjUg

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org

topLevelComment.author: NDrake B
topLevelComment.text: Thank You for this Video Daniel.

topLevelComment.author: Lee Nicholson
topLevelComment.text: The Medium article is more helpful than the video -- so be sure to look at it.

topLevelComment.author: Abhishek Kumar
topLevelComment.text: Thank u for this awesome video

topLevelComment.author: Kevin Zhang
topLevelComment.text: VS Code is the best and it dominates the text editor market now ...

replies.author: Aayush Bisen
replies.text: yeah in the latest Stackoverflow developer's survey it's the most used text editor.
